Release Notes:
What's New
  • Add Edit Contract and Edit Vendor actions and views on the Custom List
  • Updated ADM to generate small payment request automatically at closeout stages
  • FEMA Data Section
    • Feed  the Project ID(s) field into the PW in the FEMA data section
    • Add new Effective Cost Share % field into the PW in the FEMA data section
    • Add new Latest Obligated date field into the PW in the FEMA data section
  • Add Insurance Deduction field added on the PW details tab
  • Management Roles
    • Add PW Hold action for COR3 Management Roles to put a PW on hold 
    • Add PW release action for COR3 Management Roles to remove PW on hold action 
  • Add new "Waiting on Another PW" checkbox in the Ready for Closeout area to Closeout Tab to mark those PW's that are currently waiting for another PW. 
  • Update DRS Project Cost Line Item data to all PW's 
  • Add new Total Insurance Deduction Amount field in all PW's 

Bug Fixes
  • Resolved and Percentage Complete Validation Discrepancies with PW folder 3384-FPA-PW-000001738

Data Updates
  • Update Project Size of PW Folder's 4339-FPA-PW-000001884, 4339-FPA-PW-000000487, 4339-FPA-PW-000000049, 4339-FPA-PW-000000364, 4339-FPA-PW-000000067, 4339-FPA-PW-000000687, 4339-FPA-PW-000002315, 4339-FPA-PW-000002522 from Small to large
  • Update Project Version of PW Folder's 4339-FPA-PW-000000282, 4339-FPA-PW-000000363, 4339-FPA-PW-000001840, 4339-FPA-PW-000002053, 4339-FPA-PW-000002267 
  • Update to compare DRS Cost Share Percentages to Actual Cost Share Percentage to work with accurate data in DRS

Data Updates
  • Updates to fix expenses amounts for PW Transfer help desk request

What's New
  • Functionality update to Project Management Cost screen for decimal accuracy for Rate, Cost and Hour fields.
  • Functionality update to Document Upload screen for improved validation when uploading documents. 
  • HMGP Payment letter includes SHMO signature and credentials

Bug Fixes:
  • Effective date format fixed in Edit Rate price line item.

What's New?


  • Edited the Cost Line Exceptions Report to remove the cost codes 5900 and 5901.
  • Added Disaster Number column to the PW Obligations Reports.
  • Enhancement to the Closeout Project Report to include 3 new columns: Waiting on Another PW, Total RFR Payment Complete Amount, and Pending RFR Amount.

What's New
  • Validation functionality for the duplication "splitting" of CRs with multiple release dates.
  • Informational Text to Greater Than A Feature Validation Dialogue Box
  • Bug fix for Process Error on 'Greater Than A Feature' Validation Flow

What's New
  • Re-Architecture of Collaboration Portal - Closeout Document Sub-Site/Libraries (Phase 3)
  • Functionality to bypass UAR Form Approval step for UARs submitted by G. Pastrana or H. Rivera

Data Updates:
  • Fixed issue with leading whitespaces in the PF_Damages table
  • Updated SQL view for reporting

What's New:
  • Functionality to create "sister" actions for MVC to leverage for S&H updates - applicant and projects

Bug Fix:
  • Add 4 new EHP Document Types
  • Modify Status and history message to match the action taken
